column5: OUR MODERN URBAN RETREAT AWAITS YOU. Stay in the heart of Houston in the historic Montrose neighborhood. Fully renovated condo with all new appliances. Modern kitchen, open living room, spa-like bathroom, flexible dining/work space, & spacious bedroom. WALK SCORE OF 84 with nearby famous restaurants, bars, & coffee shops. CONVENIENT CENTRAL LOCATION near Downtown/Convention Center/Theater District, sports/music venues, Midtown, Medical Center, museums, The Heights, Washington Ave., & Chinatown.
column8: Modern Montrose Urban Retreat w/ Perfect Location
